name: Deviation Expert
description: Range -25%, Fire Rate +10%, Status DMG +20%

name: Elemental Havoc
description: Elemental DMG +10%. When HP is above 90%, 10% additionally

name: Fateful Strike
description: Cannot deal Weakspot DMG. Crit rate +10% and Crit DMG +30%

name: First Move Advantage
description: After reloading, Crit Rate +10%, Crit DMG +20% for 2s

name: Mag Expansion
description: When the magazine is empty, Magazine Capacity +30%

name: Momentum Up
description: Fire Rate +10% for the first 50% of the magazine and Weapon DMG +30% for the next 50% of the magazine

name: Precise Strike
description: Hitting Weakspot grants +12.0% Weakspot DMG for 3 seconds, up to 3 stacks

name: Work of Proficiency
description: Reloading an empty mag grants +10% Reload Speed and +15.0% Status DMG, lasting until the next reload

name: Blaze Amplifier
description: Every stack of Burn grants +3% Psi Intensity DMG

name: Blitzkrieg
description: Fast Gunner stacks +5 and additional Fire Rate +1% fir each stack

name: Break Bounce
description: When a bullet hits an enemy with HP above 50% the bullet's Ultimate DMG +50%

name: Delayed Blast
description: Vefore the bomb explodes, for every 5 hits taken, the bomb's Ultimate DMG +12%

name: Explosive Shrapnel
description: The 20th Shrapnel is explosive and deals +300% DMG with guaranteed critical hit

name: First Electrocution
description: For enemies without Power Surge status, Power Surge's Ultimate DMG +30%

name: Gunslinger
description: When in Fast Gunner status, Weakspot DMG +30%

name: Light Cannon
description: No Super Armor inside Fortress Warfare while in Fortress Warfare state, Attack +12%

name: Lingering Frost
description: The longer the duration of Frost Vortex, the higher the Frost Vortex Final DMG, up to +60%

name: Most Wanted
description: Every time an enemy is marked, Attack +5% for 8s. Effect can stack up to 3 times

name: Obliteration
description: The more enemies inside Frost Vortex, the higher the Ultimate DMG of Frost Vortex, up to 60%

name: Point Detonation
description: When Unestable Bomber hits only one enemy, Unstable Bomber Final DMG +25%

name: Precision Bounce
description: The 6th Bounce is Precision Bounce and deals +100% DMG with guaranteed critial hit

name: Retrusion Explosion
description: Crit DMG +40% for enemies with Burn

name: Shrapnel Carnage
description: The chance of Shrapnel hitting Weakspots is increased by 100.0%, with Weakspot DMG +25.0%

name: Targeted Strike
description: When hitting marked enemies, Crit Rate +10%, and Crit DMG 25%

name: Thunderclap
description: After triggering Power Surge 20 times, the next hit summons Celestial Thunder (Shock DMG od 200% PSI Intensity)

name: Unbreakable
description: Fortress Warfare range -30%. While in Fortress Warfare state, Attack +15%

name: Critical Rescue
description: DMG Reduction 20% and Healing Received +20% when HP is below 30%

name: Enduring Shield
description: When out of combat, gain 1 stack of Safe Heaven ever 5s. Effect can stack up to 5 times. With every 5 damage received, remove 1 stack of Safe Heaven to get 8% shield for 3s

name: Head Guard
description: When HP is above 70%, the head area is no longer a weakspot

name: Head-on Conflict
description: Having enemies within 7 metes around you grants a 10% DMG Reduction. Taking melee DMG from enemies grants an extra 10.0% DMG Reduction for 5 seconds

name: Healing Fortification
description: When using a healing shot, DMG Reduction 40% for 2s

name: Quick Comeback
description: When using a healing shot, Movement Speed +20% for 2s and refill the magazine from the inventory up to 100%

name: Rejuvenating
description: When HP is above 60%, a kill recovers 15% lost HP

name: Resist Advantage
description: When out of combat, gain 1 stack of DMG Reduction 5% every 10s. Effect can stack up to 5 times. 1 stack is removed when hit

name: Status Immune
description: When HP is lower than 60%, purge all Deviated State (cooldown: 15s)

name: Crit Amplifier
description: Crit Rate +10%, Crit DMG +15%

name: Crit Boost
description: Crit Rate +15.0%

name: Elemental Overload
description: Element DMG (Blaze, Frost, Shock, Blast) +18%

name: Melee Amplifier
description: Melee DMG +20.0%

name: Munitions Amplifier
description: Weapon DMG +15.0%

name: Status Enhancement
description: Status DMG +20.0%

name: Weakspot DMG Boost
description: Weakspot DMG Boost +25%

name: Bullet Siphon
description: Weapon DMG +5%. Every 5 bullets consumed in the magazine grants +4% Weapon DMG, capped at 20%

name: Deadshot
description: Each Crit Hit by non-melee weapons grants +5% Crit DMG, up to 45%. The effect is removed upon the next reload

name: Melee Momentum
description: Killing with melee attacks restores 30.0% of Max Stamina and grants +20.0% Melee DMG for 8 seconds

name: Precision Charge
description: For every 10% Weakspot hit rate of the previous magazine, Elemental DMG +4%, up to 24%, lasting for 10s. Reloading resets the calculation

name: Reload Rampage
description: Killing 2 enemies refills 2 bullets from inventory (no more than half of the mag), and grants +10.0% Weapon and Status DMG, lasting until the next reload

name: Status Amplification
description: When the magazine is empty, Status DMG +10% for 12s (up to 3 stacks)

name: Three Strikes
description: For the first three hits aftes reloading (not exceeding 50% of magazine capacity), Weakspot DMG +30%

name: Unstoppable
description: Weakspot DMG +10% when a bullet hits a target more than 20m away. For every additional 1 meters away from the target, Weakspot DMG +1% up to 20%

name: Covered Advance
description: Taking no DMG within 4s grants +20% Melee, Weapon, and Status DMG for 30 seconds. The effect resets when the duration ends

name: Ferocious Charge
description: Killing enemies within 10 meters grants Melee, Weapon DMG, Status DMG +20% for 8s

name: Rush Hour
description: Every 10% HP loss grants +4% Melee, Weapon, and Status DMG

name: Ruthless Reaper
description: After accumulating 2 kill(s), refill the 100% of your magazine from your reserves

name: Secluded Strike
description: Having no enemies within 7 metes around you grants +15% Weapon and Status DMG

name: Slow and Steady
description: +10% Melee, Weapon, Status DMG. When HP is above 90%, DMG +10%
